member.name: T:SySal.Services.NExTSrvHost_Win.Configuration
member.summary: Configuration of the NExT Service Host.

member.name: F:SySal.Services.NExTSrvHost_Win.Configuration.DBServer
member.summary: Encrypted DB server name. If this is a zero-length string, other DB-related fields are ignored, and the configuration is set from the file.

member.name: F:SySal.Services.NExTSrvHost_Win.Configuration.DBConfigQuery
member.summary: If empty, the configuration is read from the file; otherwise, it specifies the scalar query that retrieves the configuration from the DB.
member.remarks: The string _ID_MACHINE_ is replaced with the id of the machine running the query.

member.name: F:SySal.Services.NExTSrvHost_Win.Configuration.PollingIntervalMS
member.summary: The status of all services is checked periodically after this time interval (in milliseconds).

member.name: M:SySal.Services.NExTSrvHost_Win.NExTSrvHost_Form.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:SySal.Services.NExTSrvHost_Win.NExTSrvHost_Form.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: M:SySal.Services.NExTSrvHost_Win.Program.Main
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.

member.name: T:NExTSrvHost_Win.Properties.Resources
member.summary: Classe di risorse fortemente tipizzata per la ricerca di stringhe localizzate e così via.

member.name: P:NExTSrvHost_Win.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Restituisce l'istanza di ResourceManager nella cache utilizzata da questa classe.

member.name: P:NExTSrvHost_Win.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Esegue l'override della proprietà CurrentUICulture del thread corrente per tutte le ricerche di risorse eseguite utilizzando questa classe di risorse fortemente tipizzata.
